aboutMe.presentation1: Hello, my name is Valentin HIPPOLYTE, a motivated and dynamic developer with a Master’s degree in Computer Engineering.
aboutMe.presentation2: After three years of apprenticeship at Worldline, where I developed features for international banking clients, I am now looking for a new professional challenge.

description.casa-cal-y-sol: A showcase website for a family vacation home in Andalusia with an integrated booking system.
description.ghiblix: An app to discover and manage Ghibli films: add to favorites, track views, and explore films.
description.full-stack-boilerplate: A minimal full-stack application template designed to serve as a starting point, containerized with Docker.

casa-cal-y-sol.description: A showcase website developed for a family vacation home in Andalusia. Presentation, availability, and a reservation form are all designed to create a simple and welcoming experience.

features.1: Development of the site based on a personalized graphic charter
features.4: Multilingual version with translation management (Vue I18n)

casa-cal-y-sol.challenge: Integration of the Smoobu API by bypassing their widget for a 100% personalized calendar display, in accordance with the graphic charter and user experience.

ghiblix.description: Ghiblix is ​​a full-stack application I developed to combine personal enjoyment with skill development. It allows you to discover Studio Ghibli films, view their profiles, and track those you've already seen, all in a simple, responsive interface.

features.1: Complete list of Studio Ghibli movies, with posters, titles, and summaries
features.2: Ability to mark movies as 'watched' to track your progress
features.3: Detailed movie pages with description, release date, director, etc.
features.4: Sign up / login with JWT to manage a personal profile and save your data

ghiblix.challenge: Managing user state (movies watched) securely and persistently. Implementing a REST API with JWT authentication for personal tracking. This project allowed me to structure a complete Full Stack architecture and adopt a clean Git workflow, even solo.

full-stack-boilerplate.description: Minimal full-stack application template designed as a flexible foundation for web projects. Clear front-end/back-end architecture, containerized with Docker for simplified and consistent deployment.

features.2: JWT-based user authentication for secure access
features.3: Development environment with Docker containers for front-end, back-end, and database
features.4: Configuration of services (front-end, back-end, and MongoDB) in a single docker-compose.yml file

full-stack-boilerplate.challenge: Understanding Docker and multi-container environments through a minimal Full Stack model, with clear integration of front, back, and database.
